resources.string: Get free assistance finding the most economical choices on all your shopping needs. Kuanz lets you build customized errand lists and analyzes up-to-date prices from local supermarkets so you always get the best deal. Simply enter the generic names of desired items into the easy-to-use interface located under Your Shopping in the Shopping tab. Head over to Map and view a personalized map of nearby supermarkets selling the products on your lists, complete with estimated prices at each location.

In your dashboard, create a list. Then click on that list. Add items to that list. In the map, select the list you want, input a valid zip code and radius (ideally 10 to 30). The map will show you the five cheapest grocery stores that carry your products. If you click on the markers, you can see the price ranks, with 1 being the cheapest and 5 being the most expensive.
Check back later for grocery-related resources!

Find everything you need in commute-related dashboard. Kuanz centralizes information on today\'s gas prices, nearby public transportation lines, and wallet-friendly alternatives so you can commute with ease every day. See current fuel prices at nearby gas stations and estimated costs for public transportation under Your Transportation in the Transportation tab. Grant location permissions and easily visualize your choices under Map. Click on the Information icon to save big with Kuanz\'s alternative transportation tips and feel good about your commute with resources for building environmental sustainability into your routines.

In your dashboard, view current average gas prices in the Greater Seattle Area. Navigate to the map and input a specific location to view Puget Sound public transportation stations within walking distance. Alternatively, just click Search with blank latitude and longitude entries to see public transportation stations near UW
Bike & Scooter Sharing: $0.15 to $0.36 per minute

Further Resources


Metro Transit:
https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/travel-options/bus

Puget Sound Transit:
https://www.soundtransit.org/ride-with-us/how-to-pay/fares

Transition to Electric:
https://ev.pse.com/incentives

King County Vanpool Program:
https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/travel-options/vanpool-and-vanshare/vanpool
